summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2590, for the improvement of Terry Avenue North from Harrison Street to Mercer Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading the same to the grades established in Ordinance No. 28142; by making all necessary provisions to care for the surface drainage; by the alteration, construction and reconstruction of sewers and water mains, together with all appurtenances necessary for the sewerage, drainage, water service and fire protection of said district; by the construction and reconstruction of concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks; and by planking and replanking the same where necessary.
